meanings.definition: A person who behaves in an extravagant way in order to attract attention.
meanings.sent1: The exhibitionists at the party wore bright, flashy clothes to stand out.
meanings.sent2: Some people are natural exhibitionists and love being the center of attention.
meanings.sent3: The exhibitionists in the talent show put on a wild and colorful performance.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was like that of an exhibitionist, always seeking the spotlight.
meanings.sent5: The group of exhibitionists in the parade danced energetically to catch everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A person who enjoys showing off their body in a sexual manner.
meanings.sent1: The beach was crowded with exhibitionists flaunting their bodies in skimpy swimsuits.
meanings.sent2: Some exhibitionists feel empowered by expressing themselves through their physical appearance.
meanings.sent3: The exhibitionists at the nude beach were confident and unapologetic about their bodies.
meanings.sent4: In the dimly lit club, she felt like an exhibitionist under the gaze of strangers.
meanings.sent5: The exhibitionists in the adult film industry are comfortable with their bodies and sexuality.
